titleStmt.title: A briefe vievve of the weake grounds of popery as it was propounded to D. Norrice, priest, by T.V. gent: and returned without answere.
titleStmt.author: Udall, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Humfrey Lownes, for Samuel Macham, and Mathew Cooke, and are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Tigers head,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The weake grounds of popish religion.
Identified as STC 24567 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Tigers head
